text:
⚠️The #coronavirus attacks the lungs & also the brain, heart, kidneys, pancreas & other organs & can cause blood clots—leading to strokes—and severe inflammation.

#COVID19 survivors can suffer long-term fatigue, shortness of breath & other complications.
